729788f-a.folder: Union Avenue & Forest Court, Staten Island, NY
729788f-a.text:
60 Union Avenue, west side, between Forest Court and Sylvan Place.  The house was owned by H. Van Name in 1874 and Elizabeth Miller in 1898 and 1907.
April 23, 1932
P.L. Sperr
729788f-a.title: Richmond: Union Avenue - Forest Court

729790f-a.text:
(1)
Union Avenue, at the N. W. corner of Forest Court, showing the Mariners Harbor Baptist Church.
Anril 23, 1932

(2)
The rear of the church, seen from Bush Avenue.
April 23, 1932
P. L. Sperr
